titleInfo.title: CONCURRENT RESOLUTION ON THE BUDGET FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018

name.namePart: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

extension.searchTitle: CONCURRENT RESOLUTION ON THE BUDGET FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 173

congVote.result: So the motion to concur was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2018 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2019 through 2027
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House concurred in the Senate amendment to H. Con. Res. 71, establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2018 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2019 through 2027, by a yea-and-nay vote of 216 yeas to 212 nays, Roll No. 589.

IRAN BALLISTIC MISSILES AND INTERNATIONAL SANCTIONS ENFORCEMENT ACT

extension.searchTitle: IRAN BALLISTIC MISSILES AND INTERNATIONAL SANCTIONS ENFORCEMENT ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 173

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Iran Ballistic Missiles and International Sanctions Enforcement Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measure. Consideration began Wednesday, October 25th.<P/>H.R. 1698, amended, to expand sanctions against Iran with respect to the ballistic missile program of Iran, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 423 yeas to 2 nays, Roll No. 590.

extension.searchTitle: CLOTURE MOTION; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 173

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate resumed consideration of the nomination of Trevor N. McFadden, of Virginia, to be United States District Judge for the District of Columbia.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 85 yeas to 12 nays (Vote No. 252), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.
